Song.title: To God Be The Glory
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Fanny Crosby Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: To [F]God be the glory, great [C]things He hath [F]done, So [Bb]loved He the [F]world, that He [G]gave us His [C]son, Who [F]yielded His life, an a[C]tonement for [F]sin, And [Bb]opened the [F]life-gate, that [C]all may come [F]in.
Chorus: Praise the [F]Lord, praise the Lord, let the earth hear His [C]voice, Praise the [C]Lord, praise the Lord, let the people re[F]joice! O [F]come to the Father, through [C]Jesus the [F]Son, And [Bb]give Him the [F]glory, great [C]things He hath [F]done.
Verse 2: O [F]perfect redemption, the [C]purchase of [F]blood! To [Bb]every be[F]liever the [G]promise of [C]God; The [F]vilest offender who [C]truly be[F]lieves, That [Bb]moment from [F]Jesus a [C]pardon re[F]ceives.
Verse 3: Great [F]things He hath taught us, great [C]things He hath [F]done, And [Bb]great our re[F]joicing, through [G]Jesus the [C]Son, But [F]purer and higher and [C]greater will [F]be Our [Bb]wonder, our [F]transport, when [C]Jesus we [F]see.
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 to god be the glory great things he hath done so loved he the world that he gave us his son who yielded his life an atonement for sin and opened the lifegate that all may come in chorus praise the lord praise the lord let the earth hear his voice praise the lord praise the lord let the people rejoice o come to the father through jesus the son and give him the glory great things he hath done verse 2 o perfect redemption the purchase of blood to every believer the promise of god the vilest offender who truly believes that moment from jesus a pardon receives verse 3 great things he hath taught us great things he hath done and great our rejoicing through jesus the son but purer and higher and greater will be our wonder our transport when jesus we see
